quote: He didn't ask ""Where will you spend eternity?"" as religious the-end-is-near picketers did but rather, ""With what, in this modern democracy, will you meet the demands of your soul?
quote_letters: HE DIDNT ASK WHERE WILL YOU SPEND ETERNITY AS RELIGIOUS THE-END-IS-NEAR PICKETERS DID BUT RATHER WITH WHAT IN THIS MODERN DEMOCRACY WILL YOU MEET THE DEMANDS OF YOUR SOUL
